abstract: The organizers of a Michael Jackson tribute concert in Wales this weekend lost one of their biggest acts just days before the show when The Black Eyed Peas decided not to take part.
snippet: The organizers of a Michael Jackson tribute concert in Wales this weekend lost one of their biggest acts just days before the show when The Black Eyed Peas decided not to take part.
lead_paragraph: The organizers of a Michael Jackson tribute concert in Wales this weekend lost one of their biggest acts just days before the show when the Black Eyed Peas decided not to take part, according to wire service reports.

headline.main: Black Eyed Peas Pull Out of Jackson Tribute
